mapper.insert:
SELECT user_no FROM EP_CUST_INFO ORDER BY user_no DESC LIMIT 1
insert into EP_CUST_INFO( uid,user_no,cust_name,organ_no,derp_no,owner_ccc,cert_type,cert_no,sex,birthday,nation, marital,politial,education,degree,grad_school,grad_time,major,line_manager,origo,home_addr, live_addr,perm_addr,mobile_no,teleph,home_teleph,per_email,com_email,atten,atten_teleph,qq_acct, one_inch,cust_type,cust_post,cust_class,cust_status,entry_time,leftjob_time,work_time,proftitle_time,compact_start_time, compact_end_time,prob_start_time,prob_end_time,recruit_quarry,late_leave_time,open_bank,bank_card_no,endm_acct,medi_acct,mate_acct, hous_acct,attachm,remark,created_by,created_date,updated_by,updated_date) values ( #{uId},#{userNo},#{custName},#{organNo},#{derpNo},#{ownerCCC},#{certType},#{certNo},#{sex},#{birthday},#{nation}, #{marital},#{politial},#{education},#{degree},#{gradSchool},#{gradTime},#{major},#{lineManager},#{origo},#{homeAddr}, #{liveAddr},#{permAddr},#{mobileNo},#{teleph},#{homeTeleph},#{perEmail},#{comEmail},#{atten},#{attenTeleph},#{qqAcct}, #{oneInch},#{custType},#{custPost},#{custClass},#{custStatus},#{entryTime},#{leftJobTime},#{workTime},#{profTitleTime},#{compactStartTime}, #{compactEndTime},#{probStartTime},#{probEndTime},#{recruitQuarry},#{lateLeaveTime},#{openBank},#{bankCardNo},#{endmAcct},#{mediAcct},#{mateAcct}, #{housAcct},#{attachm},#{remark},#{createdBy},now(),#{updatedBy},now() )
mapper.update: update EP_CUST_INFO set cust_name=#{custName},organ_no=#{organNo},derp_no=#{derpNo},owner_ccc=#{ownerCCC},cert_type=#{certType}, cert_no=#{certNo},sex=#{sex},birthday=#{birthday},nation=#{nation},marital=#{marital}, politial=#{politial},education=#{education},degree=#{degree},grad_school=#{gradSchool},grad_time=#{gradTime}, major=#{major},line_manager=#{lineManager},origo=#{origo},home_addr=#{homeAddr},live_addr=#{liveAddr}, perm_addr=#{permAddr},mobile_no=#{mobileNo},teleph=#{teleph},home_teleph=#{homeTeleph},per_email=#{perEmail}, com_email=#{comEmail},atten=#{atten},atten_teleph=#{attenTeleph},qq_acct=#{qqAcct},one_inch=#{oneInch}, cust_type=#{custType},cust_post=#{custPost},cust_class=#{custClass},cust_status=#{custStatus},entry_time=#{entryTime}, leftjob_time=#{leftJobTime},work_time=#{workTime},proftitle_time=#{profTitleTime},compact_start_time=#{compactStartTime},prob_end_time=#{probEndTime}, recruit_quarry=#{recruitQuarry},late_leave_time=#{lateLeaveTime},open_bank=#{openBank},bank_card_no=#{bankCardNo},endm_acct=#{endmAcct}, medi_acct=#{mediAcct},mate_acct=#{mateAcct},hous_acct=#{housAcct},attachm=#{attachm},remark=#{remark}, updated_by=#{updatedBy},updated_date=now() where uid=#{uId} and user_no=#{userNo}
